title: Adult Learning
vision: All adults achieve high school literacy and have the life skills they need to succeed in careers and participate in their communities

targets.name: Literacy
targets.content: Increase literacy to high school level for 2,500 residents

targets.name: ESOL
targets.content: Expand English for Speakers of Other Languages programming by 500 students

definitions.definition: Basic literacy indicates skills necessary to perform simple and everyday literacy activities.

charts.source: US Census Bureau, American Community Survey
